start: Hey ranger! I bet that you are curious how to play this game. My name is Administrator, and I'll guide you through the basics here. Press on a response line below to answer to me. You can also use your keyboard keys 1-9 to quickly select options in any dialogue.
Wow, an interactive teaching system, nice.
On a second though, I've changed my mind. I know how to play this game and I certainly don't need your help.
minimize_tutorial: I advise you to minimize this dialogue window before we continue. Press the small triangle button in the top right corner. Don't worry, you will still be able to see what I say and respond even in the minimized state, but it will also allow you to not have this window blocking your whole screen.
Ok, I did that. What's next?
next_tutorial: Now we'll teach you how to control your camera. Ready?
cancel_confirm: Oh well, I'm pretty sure you can handle it on your own. Good luck!
